column4: getting use to the ways of ubuntu is killing me, personally coming from a LFS, Gentoo, and Slackware background, ubuntu is totally different the way thngs are set up
but i figured i might as well make the change cause ubuntu is the linux of the present and future, and i think it has the most potential in the desktop market
yea, things are different but it's consistent once you get the hang
yea, thats what i've heard, but using apt-get is nothing like emerege, etc-update, etc....
